Uses of Class
cams.repliable.Repliable

Packages that use Repliable
Package
Description
cams.repliable
A group of classes making up the entity and editor of repliables (suggestion and enquiry).

  • Uses of Repliable in cams.repliable

    Subclasses of Repliable in cams.repliable
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Enquiry
    The Enquiry class represents an inquiry made by a student.
    class 
    Suggestion
    The Suggestion represents a suggestion made by a camp committee member.
